transcripts.text: Hey guys, back again with another rant video, unscripted, just a stream of consciousness.  And today I want to talk about the value of always working.  And this goes beyond the material sense, though I will come back to that.  but as a man once you find the concepts of individuality and forging your own path independent of external validation you start to lose the motivation to work and not just to work to make money but to work on yourself because.
